page.title: 17Lakeland Caravan Site
page.content:
This large caravan site is found to the south of the nearby Cark Airfield. The site,despite not having any beaches nearby, is very popular.It has a large number of static caravans and a small number of chalets. There is an area for touring caravans that is being developed. The site has good facilities ,with a swimming pool,entertainments centre and amusement arcade.
The caravan site makes an excellent base for visiting the attractions of the area,such as{Cartmel Priory}and {Holker Hall.}Travelling a little more brings you into the{Lake District. {Coniston}and{Windermere}are within 30 minutes drive
